name: Calliope
description:
Made for Ludum Dare Jam 41: 2 Incompatible Genres

Genres selected: Stealth and Rhythm

Your true love Calliope is being held captive. Rescue her from the castle, but don't get caught. Sneak past the castle guards while simultaneously keeping Calliope quiet by tapping along to her song... in your head.

We had a lot of fun working on this, although we may have been in over our heads.

Made using:

Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator, Blender, Visual Studios, Unity, Renoise, Audacity

Windows, Mac, Cintiq 13hd, Wacom Intuos

in C#
